metadata.title: CVE-2025-0167 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description: When asked to use a `.netrc` file for credentials **and** to follow HTTPredirects, curl could leak the password used for the first host to thefollowed-to host under certain circumstances.This flaw only manifests itself if the netrc file has a `default` entrythatomits both login and password. A rare circumstance.

criterions.comment: curl package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
